name: JFCardSelectionViewController
summary: A fancy collection style view controller that provides an easy-to-use and beautilful UI/UX for presenting data (Ex. Contacts)
description:
A fancy collection style view controller that provides an easy-to-use and beautilful UI/UX for presenting data (Ex. Contacts) 
that was inspired by this Profile Card mockup: https://dribbble.com/shots/1458441-Profile-Card/attachments/216311
